gov.nasa.arc.mct.services.component
Interface ComponentRegistry

All Known Subinterfaces:
CoreComponentRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExternalComponentRegistryImpl
public interface ComponentRegistry

This interface provides administrative functionality for component types. An instance can be obtained through OSGI, using code like: 

    org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc = ... // will be obtained through an activator
    ServiceReference ref = bc.getServiceReference(ComponentRegistry.class.getName());
    if (ref != null) 
      ComponentRegistry registry = (ComponentRegistry) bc.getService(ref);
    ...
    bc.ungetServiceReference(ref);
An instance of this class can also be obtained using the OSGI declarative service functionality.

Method Detail

newInstance

<T extends AbstractComponent> T newInstance(java.lang.Class<T> componentClass,
                                            AbstractComponent parent)
Create a new instance of the specified component class. Components must be initialized with the MCT framework, so this method must be used when creating instances of components. Failure to do this will result in components which are not fully initialized and the system behavior when using these components is undefined.

Type Parameters:
T - specific base component type to create
Parameters:
componentClass - used to identify a component.
parent - to add newly created instance to. This value can be null which signifies that this will only show up under the created by me area.
Returns:
a new component instance or null if there is no component matching the given componentClass

getComponent

AbstractComponent getComponent(java.lang.String id)
Get the component based on the component id.

Parameters:
id - the component id
Returns:
the component object

newCollection

AbstractComponent newCollection(java.util.Collection<AbstractComponent> components)
Creates a new collection that contains components under the Created By Me component.

Parameters:
components - the components to be added in the new collection
Returns:
the new collection; null if the action is rejected by policies
